Field.Name: ImportantMessageCategoryIconUrl
Field.Description: The relative URL to the icon image for this category. Ideally you should leverage the AppImages picture library to store your icons, as the App only has permission to read contents from its own App Web. If you use the AppImages picture library, the URL will be something like this: ../Lists/AppImages/imagename.png (make sure to use a relative URL). Recommended icon size is 36px by 36px.

Field.Name: UIForegroundColor
Field.Description: The HEX color code applied to the text for this category. If an invalid HEX color code is used, the default text color will be applied.

Field.Name: UIBackgroundColor
Field.Description: The HEX color code applied to the background for this category. If an invalid HEX color code is used, the default background color will be applied.

ContentType.Name: Important Message Category
ContentType.Description: Contains details about the message category, which includes the location of the icon that is associated with each category.
